body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting SecureRide. My name is Jose Thomas. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jane. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling happy, thank you. I have some concerns about the security in your car dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course. Can you provide me with your vehicle's license plate number and the date of your last visit to the dealership?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My license plate number is six five A B C three four and my last visit was on one zero zero two two zero two two.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the information, Jane. We take security seriously and will address your concerns. Is there anything else you'd like to share?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Jane. We will look into this matter promptly. If you have any more questions, feel free to contact us. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you. Have a great day too.
